scripts.apps:dev: concurrently "yarn run mongo:start" "wait-on tcp:localhost:27017 && cross-env FORCE_COLOR=1 turbo run dev --parallel"
scripts.build:graphql: (cd apps/api && pnpm run build:graphql) && (cd apps/web && pnpm run build:graphql)
scripts.mongo:start: docker run --rm -p 27017:27017 --name scrib-mongo -v mongo_data:/data/db -e MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE=scrib mongo > /dev/null

hooks.pre-push: (cd apps/api && pnpm run build:graphql) && git add apps/api/src/graphql/schema/schema.graphql
